full_output.summary: Result-driven Full Stack Developer with 0.6-months experience seeking full-time roles

projects.name: RBAC -> Role-Based Access Control
projects.description: The RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) Application played a pivotal role in access control, ensuring secure authentication and authorization. It was built with React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Material-UI (MUI), facilitating seamless management of user roles. Key features included a user-friendly frontend, scalable backend, MongoDB for flexible data storage, Material-UI for modern design, and role-based access control mechanisms. This application ensured consistent and secure user authentication and authorization, enhancing overall security across applications through advanced technologies. It significantly improved access management efficiency, resulting in a 20% reduction in unauthorized access attempts and a 30% increase in system security robustness.

projects.name: Over Time
projects.description: The OT Over Time Application was an innovative employee management solution, powered by React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and Material-UI (MUI). It dynamically calculated overtime based on attendance and leave records, ensuring seamless functionality for administrators and employees. Key features included a user-friendly interface, a reliable backend, scalable data storage, modern design, advanced overtime algorithms, and role-based access management. With the implementation of this application, optimization speed increased by 30%, resulting in more efficient workforce management processes. This advancement not only boosted employee satisfaction but also ensured more precise resource allocation through cutting-edge technologies.

experiences.description: Developed web applications using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack, ensuring efficient performance and scalability of the applications. Contributed to the development and customization of WordPress websites, leveraging PHP and WordPress APIs to meet client requirements and deliver high-quality projects. Collaborated with the development team to troubleshoot issues and implement solutions, gaining practical experience in resolving technical challenges and enhancing problem-solving skills.

Addressed student doubts promptly, providing clear explanations and guidance to ensure their understanding of complex concepts. Offered personalized assistance to students working on projects, effectively diagnosing and resolving errors to facilitate project completion and learning outcomes. Conducted regular code reviews and provided constructive feedback to students, helping them improve coding skills and adopt best practices in software development.
